product_name: Merrell Sharp Peak Insulated Jacket - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The Merrell Sharp Peak insulated jacket offers warmth and waterproof, windproof protection, helping you to enjoy snowy days on the slopes without a single shiver. Opti-Warm(TM) synthetic insulation offers lightweight warmth that continues to insulate when wet. Polyester 2-layer Opti-Shell waterproof breathable coating stands up to Mother Nature; jacket is fully seam sealed; polyester taffeta lining easily slides over base layers. Merrell Sharp Peak jacket features an inner media pocket and zippered hand pockets. Removable hood; zippered underarm vents; removable powder skirt; drawcord hem. Closeout.
short_description: The Merrell Sharp Peak insulated jacket offers warmth and waterproof, windproof protection, helping you to enjoy snowy days on the slopes without a single shiver.
